mapper.insert: insert into recruit(pid, title, contents, endDate, makeDay, changeDay, makeId, changeId) select #{pid}, #{title}, #{contents}, date_add(now(), interval 7 day), now(), now(), #{makeId}, #{changeId} where exists (select * from project where pid = #{pid}) and exists (select * from userInfo where id = #{makeId}) and exists (select * from userInfo where id = #{changeId}) ;
